authors.name: Shannon McCall
authors.affiliation: Duke BioRepository & Precision Pathology Center, Duke University Hospital, Durham, NC, USA

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"329g","text":"To provide a standardized method of running, cleaning, refilling, and verifying quality of the automatic H\u0026E stainer. Every morning before running slides for projects, a quality control slide containing brain, kidney, liver, and pancreas tissue is run, reviewed, and deemed acceptable by a histotechnician, who documents this review.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"asc99","text":"Open cover of autostainer and remove each lid of the reagents inside. Stack lids and set to the","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qfmr","text":"right side of autostainer. Close cover.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmhl3","text":"Hit switch on the right side of autostainer to turn on and initialize.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8lgr","text":"Once initialization is complete, press button on screen to select staining program 1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bhu24","text":"Take one slide from the box of unstained H\u0026E control slides and label with:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b87f9","text":"    a. H\u0026E QA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch4af","text":"    b. Date","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tv4d","text":"    c. Tech initials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ddv2s","text":"Place the slide into a black 30-count slide rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dt0bh","text":"Pull the lever below the loading drawer on the autostainer to open.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8p8f4","text":"Place slide rack inside and close.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b09tg","text":"Hit button to the left of loading drawer to begin staining run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5gj9m","text":"When staining has finished, autostainer will periodically beep.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c5th1","text":"Pull the lever below the exit drawer on the autostainer to open.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"efkfv","text":"Press button next to exit drawer so instrument knows the rack was removed. (Autostainer will","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rq0u","text":"continue to beep otherwise.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a9nck","text":"Coverslip and microscopically verify correct staining of control tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"esjdj","text":"Denote onRHL Internal H\u0026E Histologic Quality Check. If staining quality is suboptimal,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f561m","text":"troubleshoot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5p8ki","text":"If staining is acceptable,write “PASS” on slide andstore in labeled control slide box next to","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nh70","text":"autostainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1k2hg","text":"File form in H\u0026E quality control binder at the end of the month.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4cbs6","text":"Any research slides for the day can be loaded in the same way once the review is complete.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17ojb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Operating Autostainer and Running Daily Quality Control
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3g4lk","text":"At the end of the workday, open cover and replace reagent lids to prevent evaporation. Close","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crnbg","text":"cover.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"166kv","text":"At the end of the work week, remove all staining containers and empty into the chemical waste containers located below autostainer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"223s4","text":"Rinse containers out with water and, working over the sink, fill with a 10% bleach solution for at least 15 minutes or until visibly clean.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dses4","text":"Rinse out containers and place upright on a counter that has been covered with Wypall pads. Leave to air dry over the weekend.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3c355","text":"Fill water wash containers with 10% bleach and then 3 changes of waterto remove bleach residue (containers will automatically drain when filled).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f01e","text":"Flush 10% bleach solution followed with 3 changes of water through the base of the stainer. Use a bleach-soaked Wypall pad to spot clean any splashed staining reagents. NOTE: Manual H\u0026E stain line should remain set up until autostainer is refilled and tested the next week to ensure one staining line is always available for use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8fobb","text":"At the beginning of the work week, refill staining containers and place back into autostainer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Protocol - Changing the Autostainer
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ff4si","text":"Mark reagents changed on Autostainer Maintenance Log.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
